name: Residence Inn Kansas City Country Club Plaza

reviews.title: Great location!
reviews.text: This was a great place to stay with family. It is very close to the plaza - just one short block up the hill. Rooms were a nice size and very quiet. There were many families staying at the hotel over Thanksgiving and we never heard kids. Breakfast was good. Parking is free, but there isn't much.

reviews.title: Loved the Residence Inn CCP
reviews.text: Spent a long weekend there with my wife and 4 month old baby 3 months ago. It's in a nice area. You can walk right into the Plaza in 5 minutes. The hotel is newly renovated and it sure feels that way.

aka: Residence Inn Kansas City Country Club Plaza Hotel
